topics.name: Overview
topics.about: The Ownership Token Index is a dashboard that makes it clear to investors exactly what elements of a protocol they own, when holding a given token.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Ownership Token Index?
questions.answer: To establish whether holding a token provides verifiable ownership rights across the protocol, the offchain IP and the value flows. We use a standardized framework so results are comparable across projects.

questions.question: Who is this for?
questions.answer: Crypto investors, governance participants, analysts, and researchers who want an objective view of token ownership quality.

topics.name: Submission
topics.about: How tokens are proposed, reviewed, and added to the index.

questions.question: How do I submit a token for analysis?
questions.answer: Use the submit flow to share your contact details, and a short description of what you would like us to include.

questions.question: What happens after I submit?
questions.answer: We will review the information and a member of our team will setup a follow up with you to discuss next steps.
